document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: BRITISH TV REQUEST Important 
Date: Mon, 08 Jun 2020 19:45:37 +0000 
yes 
From: 
Sent: Monday, June 8, 2020 3:43 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: BRITISH TV REQUEST Important 
Did the tweet go out? 
On Jun 8, 2020, at 3:36 PM, wrote: 
Will 
do. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jun 8, 2020, at 3:35 PM, 
Please decline for me. 
Begin forwarded message: 
> wrote: 
From: kathryn milofsky 
<kmilofskyfaaol.com>
Date: June 8, 2020 at 3:32:35 PM EDT 
To:'
Subject: BRITISH TV REQUEST Important 
Reply-To: kathryn milofsky <kinilofsky@aol.com>
Dear Mr 
I  am Kathryn Milofsky a  producer for ITV News based in NY.We are the largest commercial channel in 
the UK similar in style stature to NBC. 
We would be honored to do an interview with you today via Skype for about 10 minutes about your 
request to interview Prince Andrew re the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The recent MLA request. 
The interview would air on our flagship News at Ten Broadcast which is watched by millions. 
EFTA00023771

ITV News is made by ITN, which has a  global reputation as a  provider of independent, 
objective broadcast news. We are known for delivering powerful, authoritative 
coverage which is free from any political ownership. 
ITV News has the biggest reach of any commercial news provider in the UK and 
broadcasts to 8 million viewers each day. We are the main commercial competition to 
the BBC. Our recent interview with Meghan Markle had 44million views and millions 
watched the interview on tv. 
We are proud to be the network that best reaches the non-metropolitan elite in the UK. Online, the 
IN News Facebook and Twitter pages are now at 1.8m followers each and growing, with Facebook 
views pulling in an average of 55m average per month, with 5m monthly video views on Twitter. The 
ITV News website has an average of 30m page views each month. 
I  so hope you can do an interview with us. 
Kind Regards 
Kathryn Milofsky 
Producer IN News 
646 240 5544 
kmilofsky@aol.com 
EFTA00023772
